amendatorysection.catchline: Health and safety regulations; violations; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: Every person who shall violate any of the provisions of sections 48-401 to 48-423 shall be guilty of a Class II misdemeanor.

source.para: Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. IV, art. IV, § 20, p. 562;

annotation.para: Requirements of act did not apply to a landlord who was not occupant of building or operator of safety device. Quist v. Duda, 159 Neb. 393, 67 N.W.2d 481 (1954).
